name: Black Flash
description: Black Flash is a rare advanced cursed technique. It is an amplified physical attack that drastically increases the damage dealt by the user's strike.

name: Divergent Fist
description: Divergent Fist is a powerful cursed technique that manipulates the trajectory of the user's attacks, making them difficult to predict and defend against.

name: Unlimited Void
description: Unlimited Void is a unique cursed technique that creates a pocket dimension, allowing the user to manipulate space and teleport objects within the void.

name: Cursed Energy Manipulation
description: controlling negative emotions' potent force for offensive and defensive purposes.

name: Reverse Cursed Technique: Removal
description: Reverse Cursed Technique: Removal is a healing technique that reverses the effects of cursed energy, restoring the user's body and healing injuries.

name: Maximum Cursed Energy Output: Cursed Spirit Manipulation
description: Maximum Cursed Energy Output: Cursed Spirit Manipulation is a technique that allows the user to control and manipulate cursed spirits, using their own cursed energy to dominate them.

name: Boogie Woogie
description: Boogie Woogie is a spatial manipulation technique that allows the user to switch places with a target, creating confusion and tactical advantages in combat.

name: Cursed Speech Manipulation
description: Cursed Speech Manipulation is a technique that enables the user to imbue their words with cursed energy, influencing and controlling the actions of others.

name: Innate Technique: Purple
description: Innate Technique: Purple is a unique cursed technique that manifests as purple energy, granting the user enhanced strength, speed, and agility.

name: Binding Vows
description: Binding Vows are powerful agreements made with cursed spirits, granting the user access to their abilities and enhancing their own cursed techniques.

name: Shikigami Summoning
description: Shikigami Summoning is a powerful technique that  involves summoning powerful canine-like shikigami to aid in battle. These shikigami possess enhanced strength, agility, and mystical abilities, making them formidable allies in combat situations.

name: Cursed Womb: Death Painting
description: a powerful entity born from cursed energy, possessing immense strength and supernatural abilities.

name: Straw Doll Technique
description: The Straw Doll Technique is a cursed technique used by Nobara Kugisaki. It involves creating straw dolls infused with cursed energy, which she can control remotely. By attacking or damaging the dolls, she can transfer the damage to her enemies, making it an effective long-range and strategic technique in combat situations.
